metadata.title: CVE-2019-16995 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 5.0.3, a memory leak exits in hsr_dev_finalize()in net/hsr/hsr_device.c if hsr_add_port fails to add a port, which maycause denial of service, aka CID-6caabe7f197d.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
